title: Quantity Surveyor
job_overview:
We are seeking a highly organized and detail-oriented Quantity Surveyor to join our team. The successful candidate will be responsible for managing all aspects of the contractual and financial side of construction projects. This includes cost planning, estimating, risk analysis, tendering, contract administration, and cost control to ensure the project is completed within budget and to the required standards.


Qualifications:
Bachelor’s degree in Quantity Surveying, Civil Engineering, Construction Management, or a related field.
Proven experience as a Quantity Surveyor in the construction industry.
Strong knowledge of construction methods, materials, and cost control systems.
Proficient in MS Office and cost estimation software (e.g., CostX, Bluebeam, PlanSwift).
Excellent analytical, negotiation, and communication skills.
High attention to detail and accuracy.
Ability to work independently and as part of a multidisciplinary team.


How to Apply:
Interested candidates may send their resume to Upgrade to see actual info look forward to hearing from you!
